title: Renovated Studio in Hollywood | Spacious Floorplan | New Appliances
posting_body: ['One of a Kind Hollywood Historic Apartment', 'A block south of bustling Hollywood Blvd, you will find The Julie Lee.', "A gorgeous, ornate brick and stone facade harkens back to 1920s Los Angeles's exquisite architecture.", 'The Julie Lee apartments have been carefully updated to feel modern and still preserve original historic details like curved entryways, crown molding, and plaster walls.', 'Our studio, junior one-bedrooms, one-bedroom, and two-bedroom apartments feature all-new beautiful kitchens with navy blue shaker cabinets, brass hardware, and floating shelves mounted on with ample windows and abundant natural light fanciful brass brackets.', 'New flooring brings warmth throughout, and oversized walk-in closets afford plentiful storage.', 'Each bathroom has been fully updated with brand new tile, designer fixtures, and a luxurious feel.', 'Community Amenities:', '- Elevator', '- On-Site Laundry', 'Apartment Amenities:', '- Marble-esque Counters', '- New Designer Light Fixtures', '- Spacious Floorplans', '- All New Bathrooms', '- Custom Kitchen Cabinets', '- Hand-crafted Built in Shelving', '- Walk-in Closets', '- New Ceiling Fans', '- All New Flooring', '- Crown Molding', '- Lots of Light', '- All New Appliances', '- New Tiled Backsplash', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cats and Dogs Welcome.', 'Additional Fees and Deposit May Apply.', 'Call for Details and Restrictions.', 'Square Footage Is Approximate.', 'Price and availability are subject to change.', '1665 North Sycamore Avenue Los Angeles, CA', 'show contact info', 'Pictures may not be of exact Unit.']
